inclusion.criterion: Hospitalized patient with documented positive stool test for CDiff
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The stool samples must were positive for Clostridium difficile toxin.

inclusion.criterion: Able and willing to provide informed consent
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Known allergy to BSS or other salicylates, including aspirin
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a 60-year-old woman with recent history of aspiration pneumonia and positive stool test for CDiff.
